prTitle: feat: add red background inline style to body tag
prBody:
## Summary

Added a red background to the HTML page by implementing an inline style attribute on the body tag.

### Changes Made
- Modified `index.html` to include `style="background-color: red;"` in the body tag
- The page will now display with a red background when loaded in a browser

### Implementation Details
- Used inline styling as requested rather than external CSS
- Preserved existing page content ("I love pizza" text)
- Clean, minimal implementation that addresses the exact requirement

Closes #32
